citations.desc: CLEANING, SANITIZATION, HOUSEKEEPING, AND PEST CONTROL.
citations.narrative:
Item Housekeeping 3.84c
At the time of inspection the pre-op room used for non-human primates is also being used as a storage area for old
documents.
The area needs to be cleaned and excess materials removed so as to insure the area is not a risk to the animals
and the pre-op area is maintained in accordance with modern accepted practices.
Correct from this 5/19/14
Exit interview conducted at the end of inspection
